tables.description: Zero points, flat fields, & QA table

columns.description: Approximate right ascension center of this CCD (deg)
Approximate declination center of this CCD (deg)
Date of observation in MJD (in UTC system)
Seeing in arcseconds determined by fitting a 2-dimensional gaussian to the median PSF of stars on the CCD
Name listed in the object tag from the CCD header
Average sky level in this image (ADU)
Astrometric header value: X reference pixel
Astrometric header value: Y reference pixel
Astrometric header value: RA of reference pixel
Astrometric header value: Dec of reference pixel
FITS HDU number in the image_filename file where this image can be found
The camera that took this image
Median zero point for the entire image (median of all CCDs of the image)
Zero point for the CCD (AB mag)
Number of stars matched to PS1 catalog of matched stars
Median astrometric offset for the CCD in arcsec
Median astrometric offset for the CCD in arcsec
Telescope boresight RA of this exposure (deg)
Telescope boresight Dec of this exposure (deg)
Median per-pixel error standard deviation, in nanomaggies
PSF norm = 1/sqrt of N_eff = sqrt(sum(psf_i^2)) for normalized PSF pixels i
Norm of the PSF model convolved by a 0.45 arcsec exponential galaxy
Version of the fits format for this PSFTYPE
Upper limit of the depth bin
Number of pixels in histogram for point source depth in g-band
Number of pixels in histogram for canonical galaxy depth in g-band
Number of pixels in histogram for point source depth in r-band
Number of pixels in histogram for canonical galaxy depth in r-band
Number of pixels in histogram for point source depth in i-band
Number of pixels in histogram for canonical galaxy depth in i-band
Number of pixels in histogram for point source depth in z-band
Number of pixels in histogram for canonical galaxy depth in z-band
Number of pixels in histogram for point source depth in Y-band
Number of pixels in histogram for canonical galaxy depth in Y-band
Ignore; all values for this column are 0
Ignore; all values for this column are 0
Number of bits per data pixel
Low edge of first LST histogram bin (deg)
Date and time at shutter open (UTC)
Observation type (object, zero, dark, dome flat)
DECam components not used for this frame
True if CCD substrate voltage is on
RASICAM global sky fraction above threshold
RASICAM local sky fraction above threshold
Primary mirror top surface temperature (deg C)
Temperature at dome back, lower (deg C)
Temperature at dome back, upper (deg C)
Guider mean guide star flux variances (arcsec)
Number of guide CCDs that remained active
Frame contains multiple exposures if true
Telescope/observatory local from which original raw data was taken
Post exposure UTC epoch from DTS
Host name of data acquisition computer
Record number assigned by the VizieR team. Should not be used for identification.
Coordinate reference frame of major/minor axes
Data from amp A is valid
Data from amp B is valid
AOS number of donuts analyzed for this CCD
number of matched stars from SCAMP
Ignore; all values for this column are either 0 or 8
Unique, time-based, CP processing hash - see the plprocid page for how to convert this to a date
FITS header keyword used to verify the integrity of the HDU
FITS header keyword used to verify the integrity of the HDU data unit
Filename of cat FITS file, e.g. c4d_160811_001340_ooi_Y_v1.cat.fits
Modified Julian Date of the observation
Quality factor, PSF-weighted fraction of good pixels
PSF-weighted fraction of flux from this source
Full width at half maximum of PSF (pix)

Octant of CCD where model was instantiated (1-8)

HEALPIX index (Nsides 4096, Nest scheme => ~52 arcsec size)
